page.title: 06EDUCATION-ANTHONY ROPER
page.content: Our school is in Eynsford. It has a very big playing field, a cricket pitch, two rounders pitches and two climbing frames. We are always free from litter because we have a rule not to eat sweets. There are very good facilities for sport, maths, science and all our other lessons. We have a computer and calculators. All classes are carpeted to help keep us warm and comfortable and to keep the noise down The hall is used for assembly, school dinners,and gym in school time, and after school for clubs like brownies, guides, gym, weight watchers, and the Eynsford Band. For gym we have mats, a cage, a wooden horse, benches, a pair of rings which we all use. We have very nice school dinners and extremely nice cooks.
